TutorialScript.TutorialStep: Oh my, is it Thursday already? Time is running out for Oswald to get what he wants.
Oswald's friend Buzz has been nagging him about their plans to double date to the prom. As if Oswald has to be worried about *that*!
Although he's not sure what's going on with Buzz and Naomi these days. Maybe some double-checking on his reckless friend might be in order.
What's computer geek Zack hanging around here for? Oswald's tried to hire him in the past for various internet-based projects, but Zack is almost as cocky and competitive as Oswald...
